remarks: Lemma for the Axiom of Power Sets with no distinct variable conditions. Revised to remove a redundant antecedent from the consequence. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)  (Revised and shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Jun-2019.)
statement:
axpowndlem2 $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( -. A. x x = z -> E. x A. y ( A. x ( E. z x e. y -> A. y x e. z ) -> y e. x ) ) ) $.
$d y z $.
